description: A Flutter widget for managing a form dialog to add or edit student information within a kindergarten management system. The widget handles input fields for student details, date pickers, and interacts with a provider to save or update data.

classes.name: StudentFormDialog
classes.description: A StatefulWidget for displaying and handling a form to create or edit Student instances.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, returning an instance of _StudentFormDialogState.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes form controllers with existing student data if provided.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of all TextEditingControllers to free resources.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI dialog containing form fields, date pickers, and action buttons.

methods.name: _selectDate
methods.description: Shows a date picker dialog to select date of birth or enrollment date.

methods.name: _saveStudent
methods.description: Validates form, constructs a Student object, and calls provider methods to add or update student data.
